name: Advance Purchase Offerâ€”Non-refundable
short_description: Turn those daydreams into reality today. Reserve at least 7 days in advance and save up to 20%!
short_description_detail_page: Why wait to book a guaranteed good time? Reserve now and save up to 20%!
description:
BOOK THIS OFFER AND ENJOY :

  • Tropically inspired elegant accommodations
  • Complimentary 2-hour kayak, paddleboard, or bicycle rental
  • Shuttle service to Key West Historic Seaport (Downtown)
  • Personalized in-room entertainment via 49-inch Smart TV
  • Access to Digital Concierge services
  • Access to complimentary resort activities, 24-hour gym, and lawn games
  • Access to 6 heated pristine pools with poolside refreshment service
  • Access to a deep-water full marina with a variety of water activities

NEED TO KNOW:

Offer must be booked at least 7 days prior to arrival. Reservation is non-refundable and non-transferable. Daily rates are subject to taxes, fees, and nightly resort fee of $37 plus tax. on-site parking is available for $20 per night plus tax per vehicle and parking space required. Restrictions and blackout dates may apply.
